issue.title: efficient batch implementation of stochastic node in autoencoder
issue.body:
Batch implementation of stochastic node (sampling from distribution) for diagonal covariance matrix.
Implemenation for full covariance matrix is remaining (cholesky decomposition).

issue.title: Deep variational IB models
issue.body: Implementations for Deep variational information bottleneck encoders and other related models.

issue.title: Parallel implementations of methods
issue.body:
Throughout the code there are comments as - ** NOTE - This can be done in parallel !
Which means that the loop can be done in parallel with instruction level parallelism (or some times data level parallelism).

issue.title: Parallel process all the models training in sigma network
issue.body: Current implementation uses sequential training of all the models of sigma network but it would massively speed up the computation if those models can be trained parallely.

issue.title: Keras type Progbar
issue.body: Currently PyGlow uses tqdm progress bar api but it would be more natural to  implement one just like keras (Note: to see keras implementation of progress bar see generic_utils in utils)

issue.title: Keras type Progbar
issue.body: Currently PyGlow uses tqdm progress bar api but it would be more natural to  implement one just like keras (Note: to see keras implementation of progress bar see generic_utils in utils)

issue.title: 0 % progress bar in the beginning
issue.body: As observed during training, at the start of every epoch there appears a 0 % bar. Fix this bug which is most probably related to how the tqdm updates its iterator.

issue.title: 0 % progress bar in the beginning
issue.body: As observed during training, at the start of every epoch there appears a 0 % bar. Fix this bug which is most probably related to how the tqdm updates its iterator.

issue.title: Fit method that directly load data from file path
issue.body: Current implementation of fit use either x, y dataset or takes dataloader as arguments. It would be more less expensive to implement a fit method that directly load data in parallel from the file path passed as argument.

issue.title: Fit method that directly load data from file path
issue.body: Current implementation of fit use either x, y dataset or takes dataloader as arguments. It would be more less expensive to implement a fit method that directly load data in parallel from the file path passed as argument.

issue.title: Implementation of Information Bottleneck Principle methods
issue.body: Implement a complete pipeline of IB principle which includes from distribution estimation to information plane coordinates to plotting IB optimality curves.

issue.title: Implementation for the Dataset
issue.body: Implement module to provide common useful datasets available.
